trans-unit.source: Represents an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<issuerNameRegistry>" name="<issuerNameRegistry>" href=""></xref> element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_<issuerNameRegistry>" name="<issuerNameRegistry>" href=""></xref>配置文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The `<issuerNameRegistry>` element configures the issuer name registry.
trans-unit.target: `<issuerNameRegistry>`元素配置了颁发者名称注册表。

trans-unit.source: The issuer name registry maps issuer tokens to a string name.
trans-unit.target: 颁发者名称注册表将颁发者令牌映射到一个字符串名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement.Type%2A> property (which represents the `type` attribute of the element) can be set to register a custom type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement.Type%2A>属性 (它表示`type`元素属性) 可以设置为注册的自定义类型。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, a type of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> is assumed.

The `<issuerNameRegistry>` element can be specified at the service level under the `<identityConfiguration>` element or on a security token handler collection under the `<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>` element.
trans-unit.target: `<issuerNameRegistry>`可以在服务级别下指定元素`<identityConfiguration>`元素或上一个安全令牌处理程序集合`<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The `IssuerNameRegistry` property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfigurationElement> class and of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenHandlerConfigurationElement> class is an instance of IssuerNameRegistryElement.
trans-unit.target: `IssuerNameRegistry`属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfigurationElement>类和的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenHandlerConfigurationElement>类是 IssuerNameRegistryElement 的一个实例。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenHandlerConfigurationElement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a string representation of the <xref:System.Type> of the issuer name registry.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Type>的颁发者名称注册表。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: It corresponds to the `type` attribute of the `<issuerNameRegistry>` element.
If it is not specified, the property is `null`, a type of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，该属性是`null`，一种<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>假定。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the <xref:System.Type> of the issuer name registry.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref:System.Type>的颁发者名称注册表。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type must derive from the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry"></xref> class.
